Work_experiences.job: Software Engineer in (Alternative Military Service) / <span>PDIS (Public Digital Innovation Space)<span>
Work_experiences.desciption: PDIS is a goveronment origanization in Taiwan, it also has another name: Executive Yuan - Ministry of Digital Audrey Tang's Office. We use new technology to improve public participation and open government. We set up a video streaming in government meeting, so people can post their comment in any where. I am a member of code team and video team . In this year, I also serve for Alternative Military Service. I learned a lot skills and public participation.

Shinda Technology is a company that continues to expand its ability. I am responsible for web site system development and technical research here. We are pursuing technological innovation and system stability. We are mainly responsible for ASP.NET C# design and development of Webform/MVC systems. In addition to improving technical skills, learn more about teamwork and communication skills.

Educations.job: Master of Computer Science and Information Engineering / Fu Jen University
Educations.desciption: During the period of the Institute, in addition to academic research, in order to accumulate work experience I worked as a software engineer and managed time effectively.I also serve as a teaching assistant for telemedicine and telehealth services and web fundamentals . My research is about web traffic.

Educations.job: Bachelor of Computer Science and Information Engineering / Ming Chuan University
Educations.desciption: During my college years, I worked hard to build basic skills. In order to improve my abilities, I developed the Android application of the school library.Also participated in the data exploration contest organized by SAS. The graduation thesis was a  web-based data mining system implementation.

Work_experiences.job: 軟體工程師 (替代役) / <span>行⁠政⁠院公⁠共⁠數⁠位創⁠新⁠空⁠間<span>
Work_experiences.desciption: 行⁠政⁠院公⁠共⁠數⁠位創⁠新⁠空⁠間是台灣的政府機構，是由唐鳳政務委員所成立的辦公室。 我們研究/使用網路新興技術來改善公眾參與和開放政府。 在政府會議上導入直播技術，以便人們可以在任何地方參與及發表言論。 我是研發和直播團隊的成員。 在這裡是非常難得的經驗，服替代役這一年。 我學到了很多技能，以及更多的公共參與。

Work_experiences.job: 軟體/商業智慧工程師 / 新達科技股份有限公司
Work_experiences.desciption: 新達科技是一個持續擴增版圖的公司，我在這邊負責網站系統開發與技術研究，追求技術創新並系統穩定，主要負責ASP.NET C# 設計、開發Webform/MVC系統。在這裡除了精進技術能力之外，更學習團隊合作及溝通的技巧。

Educations.job: 資訊工程研究所 / 輔仁大學
Educations.desciption: 在研究所期間，除了學術研究之外，為了積累實戰經驗，我兼職軟體工程師的工作並有效的管理時間，在學校也有擔任遠距醫療課程與web基本原理的教學助理。論文方面則是網站流量與內容評估的相關研究。

Educations.job: 資訊工程學系 / 銘傳大學
Educations.desciption: 在大學期間，為了提高自己的能力學以致用，我開發了學校圖書館的Android App，也參加了SAS舉辦的資料探勘比賽。 畢業專題是實作一個資料探勘網站系統。
